code: import{UserActionTypes}from"./user.types";export var googleSignInStart=function googleSignInStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.GOOGLE_SIGN_IN_START};};export var emailSignInStart=function emailSignInStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:UserActionTypes.EMAIL_SIGN_IN_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_SUCCES,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var checkUserSession=function checkUserSession(){return{type:UserActionTypes.CHECK_USER_SESSION};};export var signOutStart=function signOutStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_START};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS};};export var signOutFailure=function signOutFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(userCredentials){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_START,payload:userCredentials};};export var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(_ref){var user=_ref.user,additionalData=_ref.additionalData;return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_SUCCESS,payload:{user:user,additionalData:additionalData}};};export var signUpFailure=function signUpFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_FAILURE,payload:error};};
